analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The pricing page has the fastest load time, at 339.5 milliseconds, indicating that its resources are well-optimized.
The homepage's time to first byte (TTFB) time is relatively high, at 62.69999999998254 milliseconds. This could indicate server-side issues that need to be addressed.
The blog page's FCP time is significantly faster than the homepage's and pricing page's, suggesting that its above-the-fold content is optimized for fast loading.
